additional.bukkit.reload: &cIf you encounter any issues please use the /stop command to restart your server.
additional.bukkit.reload_issues: &cPlease note that this command is not supported and may cause issues when using some plugins.
additional.bukkit.server_closed:
&cThe server is temporary closed
&7Please come back later
additional.spigot.whitelist:
&c&nTechnical&6 work is carried out over the server.
&6Sorry for any inconvenience!
additional.spigot.full_server: &cThe server is full! You should wait until someone quits.
additional.clock.night: &e<Alarm Clock> Nocturnal Peril: The Darkness is coming!
additional.dm.natural.cactus.1: &ePlayer &2{0} &edidn't know that he can not hug with cacti.
additional.dm.natural.cactus.2: &ePlayer &2{0} &estill did not understand that he should not hug with cacti.
additional.dm.natural.cactus.4: &ePlayer &2{0} &edecided to study the cactus in detail.
additional.dm.natural.cactus.5: &ePlayer &2{0} &edecided to taste the cactus needles. Not really a good idea.
additional.sm.charge_tired: {0} &c- &7You are tired! Take a break for a while.
